exceptions.tactic: intros y x p Hprime Hlt.
intros y' x p Hprime Hlt.
intros y' x' p Hprime Hlt.
intros y' x' p' Hprime Hlt.

original: intros y x p Hprime Hlt. destruct Hprime as [Hnot_one Hdiv]. destruct (Hdiv p Hprime) as [H1 | Hp]. - left. apply H1. - apply divides_le in Hlt. apply Hdiv in Hlt. right. apply Hlt.
